title: Euler's method approximation from tabular values

content.question: The table above gives selected values for the derivative of a function g on the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CDF@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. If g(-1) = -2 and Euler’s method with a step-size of 1.5 is used to approximate g(2), what is the resulting approximation?

topic.text: 7.5: (BC ONLY) Approximating Solutions Using Euler's Method

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
